name: Beyond Spectacle
tagline: Public face and workspace for Beyond Spectacle, a hybrid conference/artist residency on the intellectual, artistic, and political legacy of the Situationist International and its relevance for the present.
body:
## Beyond Spectacle
Beyond Spectacle is a hybrid conference/artist residency on the intellectual, artistic, and political legacy of [the Situationist International](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Situationist_International) and its relevance for the present.

### Conference


### Residency
